items.sentence: It isn't only Tom that has to study. I have to study, too.

Would you be willing to work more than forty hours a week?
Which would you rather do, cook dinner or wash the dishes?
The dog on the side of the road was as dead as a doornail.
I'd have gone to Boston with you if my parents had let me.
I'm positive that it was Tom I saw in the park last night.
I'm positive it was Tom that I saw in the park last night.
How many times do I have to tell you to not smoke in here?
Tom has been accused of doing something that he didn't do.
Tom would certainly be surprised if he saw you doing that.
It's too loud in here. Let's go outside where we can talk.
Tom has been saying bad things about you behind your back.
Tom's parents got divorced when he was thirteen years old.

Spider bites are much less dangerous than scorpion stings.
I hope that Tom can managed to stay out of jail this time.

The police seized a large quantity of drugs at the school.
